Uses of Class
android.widget.LinearLayout.LayoutParams

Packages that use LinearLayout.LayoutParams
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Uses of LinearLayout.LayoutParams in android.widget
 

Subclasses of LinearLayout.LayoutParams in android.widget
static class RadioGroup.LayoutParams
          This set of layout parameters defaults the width and the height of the children to ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT when they are not specified in the XML file.
static class TableLayout.LayoutParams
          This set of layout parameters enforces the width of each child to be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT and the height of each child to be ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT, but only if the height is not specified.
static class TableRow.LayoutParams
          Set of layout parameters used in table rows.
 

Methods in android.widget that return LinearLayout.LayoutParams
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams TableRow.generateDefaultLayoutParams()
          Returns a set of layout parameters with a width of ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, a height of ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT and no spanning.
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams RadioGroup.generateDefaultLayoutParams()
           
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams LinearLayout.generateDefaultLayoutParams()
          Returns a set of layout parameters with a width of ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT and a height of ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT when the layout's orientation is LinearLayout.VERTICAL.
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams TableLayout.generateDefaultLayoutParams()
          Returns a set of layout parameters with a width of ViewGroup.LayoutParams.FILL_PARENT, and a height of ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT.
 LinearLayout.LayoutParams LinearLayout.generateLayoutParams(AttributeSet attrs)
           
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams TableRow.generateLayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams p)
          Returns a safe set of layout parameters based on the supplied layout params.
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams LinearLayout.generateLayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams p)
           
protected  LinearLayout.LayoutParams TableLayout.generateLayoutParams(ViewGroup.LayoutParams p)
          Returns a safe set of layout parameters based on the supplied layout params.
